column3: str
Jude appears anxious to continue with the production of the starlens.
Deliver aetherial conductors to Jude.
What do you say we pick up where we left off, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>?
Where traditional telescopes gather light to project an image, the starlens captures aetheric glimmers and casts that onto the surface of water, hence making stargazing possible.
As I was constructing the starlens, I realized I was missing the very piece that would allow me to do just that.
This is where I will need to, once again, borrow your seasoned hands. Might you craft some aetherial conductors for me?
Once these are finished, there will be but one thing left to do!
The Studium Deliveries list for Jude has been updated. To view the new list, speak with Jude.
I'm counting on you to make me some aetherial conductors. They will allow me to project the aether captured by the starlens onto water!
You have my utmost gratitude, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>! Regardless of how bleak the outlook is, I will find the Azure Star!

You have my gratitude! Truly, I am blessed to have crossed paths with a crafts<If(PlayerParameter(4))>woman<Else/>man</If> such as yourself! I believe our fateful union is what shall lead us to the rediscovery of the Azure Star!
Excellent! Now I have nearly everything I need.
Just one last piece and we'll be one step away from a completed starlens!
Even if I am unable to find the Azure Star, meeting you has taught me the importance of perseverance. It is a lesson I shall never forget.
Oh, what am I saying!? Of course I will find it. I must! It is a dream I have spent the last decade pursuing!
What will you say?
Exactly. Keep up the good work.
Get a hold of yourself!!!
Yes, I will continue to give it my all!
Indeed, there is plenty of time to worry at a later date. For now I must give it everything I've got!
When you find the time to craft the final missing piece, please come and find me. I will be here eagerly awaiting your visit!
Thanks to <If(PlayerParameter(4))>her<Else/>his</If> support the fire in my heart grows by the minute. In fact, it feels almost as though Ifrit has taken up residence within me!
Jude is thrilled with your efforts. He now considers you a <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Friend He Can Confide In<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.
A new quest continuing the story of the Faculty of Astronomy is now available. Upon its completion, the Studium Deliveries list for Jude will be updated.
